description: This file defines a React component 'TodoItem' for a TodoMVC application, including methods for editing, saving, and rendering a todo item.

classes.name: TodoItem
classes.description: A React component representing a single todo item with editing and toggle capabilities.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles saving or deleting the todo item based on input value.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Enables editing mode for the todo item.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events for canceling or submitting edits.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Updates component state with input value.

methods.name: shouldComponentUpdate
methods.description: Optimizes re-rendering by comparing props and state.

methods.name: componentDidUpdate
methods.description: Focuses the input field when editing begins.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Returns the JSX for rendering the todo item.
